titleStmt.title: A relation of certaine things in Spaine worthy of obseruation: Set forth by Stephen Man, one of the yeomen of his Maiesties chamber.
titleStmt.author: Man, Stephen.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Im]printed [by T. Snodham] for Iohn Browne, a[nd are] to be sold in S. Dunstanes church-[yard ..] in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: title page mutilated, with some loss of print; lacks all after page 30 (perfect copy has 161 [9] pages).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
